statements: UPDATE DiversityData SET age = 30, department = 'HR' WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE DiversityData SET name = 'Jane Doe', ethnicity = 'Asian' WHERE employee_id = 105
UPDATE DiversityData SET department = 'HR', age = 30 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE DiversityData SET name = 'Jane Doe', gender = 'Female', age = 35 WHERE department = 'Engineering';
UPDATE employees SET department='HR', age=35, gender='Female' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE diversity_stats SET gender_diversity=0.45, total_employees=50, last_updated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE department='IT';
UPDATE employees SET age = age + 1, gender = 'Female' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE diversity_stats SET total_employees = total_employees - 1, gender_diversity = 0.75 WHERE department = 'Marketing';
UPDATE demographic_data SET name='Alice', age=30 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE diversity_stats SET year=2022, department_diversity=0.75 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE demographic_data SET name = 'John Doe', age = 35, department = 'Sales' WHERE id = 100
UPDATE employee_ratings SET performance_rating = 4.5, year = 2022 WHERE employee_id = 200
UPDATE employees SET department='IT' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE demographics SET ethnicity='Hispanic', race='White', disability=true WHERE employee_id=102;
UPDATE employees SET department = 'HR', age = 30 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE departments SET department_name = 'Finance' WHERE department_id = 2;
UPDATE employee_demographics SET age = 35, gender = 'Female' WHERE id = 101
UPDATE department_demographics SET total_employees = 75, male_employees = 40, female_employees = 35 WHERE department_name = 'Sales'
UPDATE employee_demographics SET age = 32, gender = 'Male' WHERE id = 101
UPDATE department_demographics SET female_employees = 20, male_employees = 30 WHERE department_name = 'Sales'
